import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Header from './header' import './index.css' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { FiPlus,FiMinus } from 'react-icons/fi' export default function Cart() { const base_url = "http://127.0.0.1:8000" const navigate = useNavigate(); const [product,setProduct] = useState([]) const backshopping = ()=>{ navigate('/') } const style1 = { backgroundColor : '#d2c9ff', } const style2 = { borderRadius : '15px' } const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('data')) const userID = data.id if (userID) { axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/cart_view/', { userID }) .then(res => { setCart(res.data); console.log(res.data) }) .catch(error => { console.error(error); }); } }, []); const handleproduct = async()=>{ const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/product/') setProduct(response.data) console.log('product' , response.data) } useEffect(()=>{ handleproduct(); },[]) const handleadd = async()=>{ const response = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/increase/',{ }) console.log('add' , response.data) } useEffect(()=>{ handleadd(); }) return ( <>

Shopping Cart

3 items
{cart.map(cart =>(
{cart.product.title}
{cart.product.desc}
{cart.price}
))}

items 3

) }
